sub_title: Manager Customer Success at Fenergo | Building AI products to battle financial crime
summary:
Welcome on my profile!

My name is Pasquale and I am an experienced manager with a solid background in Customer Success Management and Partner Management in the SaaS B2B sector, in charge of a revenue of several millions per year.

Short Description
-------------------
★ Client success obsessed, commercially savvy, endlessly curious

Long Description
------------------
★ Able to organize my job independently and in a structured manner, to manage expectations and meet deadlines, to build and nurture relationships, to achieve growth revenue targets.

My main expertises are:
★ Organisational, analytical and relationship building
★ Negotiation
★ Cross-functional project management 
★ Stakeholder management 
★ Digital Technology and Digital Marketing
★ Data driven: reporting and data analysis
★ Communicating and problem solving
★ Manage, direct, guide and evaluate Operations teams
★ Manage volume forecast, headcount allocation and business KPIs

I enjoy and easily succeed working with people of all nationalities and cultures thanks to my experiences studying and working abroad, both in England and in the Netherlands.

This is how peers and managers see me:
✪ Self-driven
✪ Team Player
✪ Results Oriented
✪ Reliable
✪ Open Minded
✪ Friendly
✪ Precise
✪ Focused

My principal soft skill is the lateral thinking: I can solve a problem by analysing it quickly from several perspectives up to find an optimal solution and then making the most suitable decisions.

As for my academic education, I hold the following diplomas:
✔ Master in Business Communication and Digital Media (MSc)
✔ Master in Marketing and Business Communication (MA)

What I love/hate:
♥ Food, food and also...food! » Beers with friends » Travelling in unconventional ways and places » The sea of my native region in Southern Italy » Repairing stuff with my hands.
✖ Sly people » Shopping » Wasting time » Unorganized chaos » Having nothing to do » Gossip...of any sort!

If you are interested in knowing more about my professional and personal skills, then...let's connect!

I am easily reachable through LinkedIn or, in alternative, you can:
   @ email me: pasquale.comita@gmail.com
   ☏  call me: 0031 (0)6 31178041 (CET hours)

profile_positions.description:
Role 
‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Strategic business partner to both internal and external stakeholders, fighting money laundering and financial crime through an AI supported AML transaction monitoring platform
◆ Seniority: Mid-Senior level 
◆ Sector: FinTech (Financial Risk & Compliance) 

Main skills
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Team Management
◆ Stakeholder management
◆ Analytical and process-oriented mindset
◆ Financial Services 
◆ Project Management 

Main Responsibilities 
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾ 
◆ Managing a team of 6 Customer Success Managers with a portfolio of 30+ customers
◆ Defining and optimizing customer lifecycle
◆ Influencing future customer lifetime value through higher product adoption, customer satisfaction and overall health scores
◆ Analyzing data and metrics around customer engagement and growth
◆ Developing strategies for customers growth and retention
◆ Driving new business growth through greater advocacy and reference-ability
◆ Leading Customer Success Team activities
◆ Managing customers escalations by providing tailored solutions for each issue
◆ Creating company-wide culture of Customer Success
◆ Creating company-wide customer feedback loop

► www.fenergo.com ◄
profile_positions.title: Manager Customer Success

profile_positions.description:
Role 
‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Strategic business partner to both internal and external stakeholders, fighting money laundering and financial crime through an AI supported AML transaction monitoring platform. 
◆ Seniority: Mid-Senior level 
◆ Sector: FinTech (Financial Risk & Compliance) 

Main skills
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Operational Account Management 
◆ Stakeholder management 
◆ Financial Services 
◆ Project Management 

Main Responsibilities 
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾  
◆ Working with a top team of machine learning and software engineers to support financial institutions with their compliance efforts (Anti-Money Laundering / Counter-Financing of Terrorism) 
◆ Responsible for a selection of customers, making sure their risk controls are implemented, as well as ensuring the AI/ML models are operational and understood by the customer 
◆ As product specialist, using this knowledge to train and advise customers to effectively use the platform and towards their desired outcomes 
◆ Responding within SLAs to customers' queries and suggestions 
◆ Managing customer relationships and formal communication 
◆ Providing support to the Sales team in the prospecting process, being the voice of the Product and Engineering team 
◆ Having regular customer engagements and performing QBRs 
◆ Identifying, tracking, and improving the health status of each customer
◆ Developing best practices for customer growth to ensure ongoing customer success and battle churn 

► www.fenergo.com ◄

profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager - Global

profile_positions.description:
Role
‾‾‾‾‾
Build, manage and nurture relationships at all levels with senior team members of key partners organizations in multiple European markets, providing strong links to operational teams.

‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾

profile_positions.title: Account Manager – Italian Market

profile_positions.description:
Oxyme conducts social research by collecting online data about what is being shared about a selection of topics (brands, products, events, campaigns, and/or topics) on platforms aimed at facilitating a dialogue between people.
The goal is to generate generalizable insights about brands, products, events, campaigns and topics.

Main Responsibilities
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Analysis of results collected according to project needs on online platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube, websites, blog, etc.
◆ Assessing the relevancy of collected results according to project parameters
◆ Rating the results' sentiment according to sentiment analysis rules
◆ Conversion of results' rating into valuable statistics and insights for the client(s)

► www.oxyme.com ◄

► stilverleden.nl ◄
profile_positions.title: Social Media Specialist / Digital Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Staples is the world’s largest office products company with approximately $25 billions in sales and the third largest eCommerce retailer. 
Through its world-class Retail, Online and Advantage capabilities, Staples lets customers shop however and whenever they want, whether it’s in store, online or with a dedicated account manager.

Main Responsibilities
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Creation of top-quality content for the Italian BU website
◆ Analysis and improvement of products data and descriptions
◆ Research and data entry using Excel Smartsheets	
◆ Data migration and content/visual editing using STEP (a data management platform) in preparation of a corporate publication.
◆ Creation of online manuals for internal communications using SharePoint

Key Accomplishments
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ In these roles I had the opportunity to reinforce my knowledge and experience on how to write top-quality contents according to SEO rules and to migrate data, convert contents and solve issues for publication purposes.

► www.staples.eu ◄
profile_positions.title: Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
The Aquaculture Stewardship Council (ASC) is an independent not for profit organisation with global influence that aims to be the world's leading certification and labelling programme for responsibly farmed seafood. Its primary role is to manage the global standards for responsible aquaculture.

Main Responsibilities
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Administrator of the organization’s blog (WordPress) and social media pages (Twitter - LinkedIn)
◆ Administrator of the organization’s website using a CMS (Content Management System)
◆ Copywriter of press releases and blog pieces
◆ Assistance with the preparation of forthcoming global events
◆ Media monitoring (online and print) using Google Analytics
◆ Weekly and monthly reports about social media ROI and share of voice
◆ Sending of targeted e-mails about organization’s activities and events
◆ Preparation of quarterly e-newsletter using MailChimp
◆ Sentiment Analysis using the platform Radian6

Key Accomplishments
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ In this position I successfully managed to work within a small team (two communications managers and myself) having the objective of proactively influence the aquaculture sector on a global basis. My major achievements were the capacity of handling all the aspects of both internal and external communications such as, for instance, writing press releases and blog pieces, various periodic reports, preparation of events, management of organization’s website, blog, social media pages (Twitter/LinkedIn), and more.

► www.asc-aqua.org ◄

profile_positions.title: Office Manager Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Start People is an employment agency focused on providing solutions with large volumes of flexible employees, often for large organisations. The solutions are aimed at organising flexible staff in a cost-effective way. Start People maintains a vast network of candidates with a wide range of profiles and has a client network across all sectors.

Main Responsibilities
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ Performing client’ needs analysis
◆ Verification and editing of job descriptions and job profiles
◆ Posting vacancies on LinkedIn and on the most important Italian job boards
◆ Research and selection of personnel also using Boolean search operators
◆ Assisting applicants with forms and effectuating job interviews
◆ Preparing employment contracts, administration of sick or maternity leave forms, shifts, holidays, verification pay-sheets, etc: all by using the Applicant Tracking Systems ‘Intiway’

Key Accomplishments
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
◆ In this position I gained a deep understanding and expertise about all the front-office and back-office activities related to searching and selecting personnel in accordance to customers' needs. Moreover, I learned how to successfully manage the bureaucratic administration every business has to deal with.

► www.startpeople.it ◄
profile_positions.title: HR Intern

In addition, here is where I managed to become more flexible in terms of ability to adapt myself every time to new and very diverse working environments and policies.

► www.adecco.it ◄

company.name: AVIS - Italian Association of Voluntary Blood Donors

volunteer_experiences.description:
AVIS is the major Italian non-profit and charitable organisation for blood donation.
The purpose of the association is to meet the growing demand for blood and fight to eliminate the sale of blood donating blood free of charge to all without discrimination.
